channel.title: Ensidia [PI][VPS][317]
channel.description:
[b]Hello,
Welcome to [/b]
[center][img]http://lulzimg.com/i23/978c06.png[/img][/center]
Ok, So lets get started im here now looking for a good development team to start my new server with me. I currently do not need help coding as I can do most of this myself :rolleyes: I do however need some help on other stuff, here are the positions I need filled.
[u][b]Administrator[/b][/u] - [i]To help keep the people on the server in check and keep it all running smoothly.[/i] [u][b]Website Designer[/b][/u] - [i]I need someone to help me create a good and stable forums for the server. [/i] Im looking for 2 of each position, the server is currently being finished by me and I have a vps ready so when everything is done I can start hosting 24/7.
[u][b]The vps:[/b][/u]
[i]Storage: 100GB BandWidth: 2000GB CPU: 2.4 Ghz RAM: 1.5 GB [/i] [u][b]Features[/b][/u]
[i]All PvP Armours Chaotics D Claws All bosses Perfect pking And many more!!![/i]
Im very tired so I will read the reply's tommorow when I get home, cheers and hope to have you guys onboard :P

item.title: Ensidia [PI][VPS][317]
item.dc:creator: @Voicon Voicon
item.description:
@Voicon wrote:

[quote=“abdelwassa, post:28, topic:400636”][quote author=Voicon link=topic=497698.msg3643204#msg3643204 date=1309177293]
I could apply for Webmaster. I also have a VPN with 2,5GHz processor and 2GB RAM with 5MB/s upload speed. No bandwidth limits.

Age: Born 1995
Location: Finland, north of Europe
Experience: About 5 websites and Runescape from years 2005 to 2009 (i think)
Contact: I prefer to PM it.
[/quote]

do you mean vps insted of vpn??[/quote]

Actually, it is RDP. But it is alike VPS, but you can only access it from Windows Remote Desktop.

Read full topic
